XenoTypeDef.label: Gaunt
XenoTypeDef.description: Gaunts are the most populous xenotype of free persons in the Dreadfleet. Engineered to be more capable in combat and more attractive, they would struggle without access to the medical infrastructure and constant slave attentions they experience as part of their spacer pirate lifestyle. Chemically dependent of wakeup, Gaunts rarely sleep and must rely on hemogen extracted from their slaves and the medical infrastructure of biosculpter pods and the like to support their unstable constitution, which is highly vulnerable to disease and chronic illness in a wild environment. Gaunts are for the most part responsible for their own transformation, and generally dream of putting together the resources to afford an even more rarefied xenotype.
XenoTypeDef.descriptionShort: Gaunts are the most populous xenotype of free persons in the Dreadfleet. Engineered to be more capable in combat and more attractive, they would struggle without access to the medical infrastructure and constant slave attentions they experience as part of their spacer pirate lifestyle.

XenoTypeDef.label: Gorerunner
XenoTypeDef.description: A brutal engineered xenotype used for miners and the internal policing of Dreadfleet slaves. Gorerunners are tough, aggressive, unhappy, and dependent on Go-Juice.Gorerunners are capable of producing violent concotions of toxic and flammable waste which they employ to great effect in clearing tunnels or the fortifications of prey factions. Gorerunners are large, ugly and spliced with bestial features common to xenotypes used for the colonization of hostile worlds.
XenoTypeDef.descriptionShort: A brutal engineered xenotype used for miners and the internal policing of Dreadfleet slaves. Gorerunners are tough, aggressive, unhappy, and dependent on Go-Juice. Gorerunners are capable of producing violent concotions of toxic and flammable waste which they employ to great effect in clearing tunnels or the fortifications of prey factions.

XenoTypeDef.label: Liche
XenoTypeDef.description: Liches make up most of the ruling caste of the Dreadfleet. The use of archotech to enhance their genetic engineering has allowed Liches to obtain a sort of immortality, which they almost always supplement with heavy use of Luciferum. Liches are acutely hemogenic and need the blood pumped from slaves to survive in comfort.
XenoTypeDef.descriptionShort: Liches make up most of the ruling caste of the Dreadfleet. The use of archotech to enhance their genetic engineering has allowed Liches to obtain a sort of immortality, which they almost always supplement with heavy use of Luciferum. Liches are acutely hemogenic and need the blood pumped from slaves to survive in comfort.
